answers.answer: You still need a good eye exam by an ophthalmologist Eye MD or optometrist. that being said there are numerous posts of people seeing different colors (read, yellow, green, pink) momentarily on awakening.  If it clears quickly it rarely is a problem and reflects that different retina systems waking up and retuning to daylight. There are different systems for bright light, twilight and dark and color and black/white cellsJCH MD

question: I have had a few episodes of seeing green upon awakening.  Everything is green for a few minutes, then goes back to normal!  This last time was just the left eye.  I don't have diabetes or high blood pressure.  Any ideas out there?
title: Seeing green!
